tophersmith.security.headers.impl

Class AbstractHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • tophersmith.security.headers.impl.AbstractHeader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentSecurityPolicyHeader, StrictTransportSecurityHeader, XContentTypeOptionsHeader, XFrameOptionsHeader, XXSSProtectionHeader

    public abstract class AbstractHeader
extends Object
    Base Abstraction for all headers

    Chris Smith

        public String getHeaderName()
        Returns:
        required header name

      • validate

        public abstract void validate()
                       throws InvalidHeaderException
        ensure all header values are set correctly individually or in combination. Assumed valid if no exception is thrown.
        Throws:
        InvalidHeaderException - if any validate error occurs

      • buildHeaderValue

        public abstract String buildHeaderValue()
        Constructs a String representation of the value of this header. Does not validate.
        Returns:
        a String representation of this header's value
